xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: entitynamevalidation.currentStrategy.label=Current naming strategy entitynamevalidation.currentStrategy.hint=The name strategy will be used when creating, renaming, or saving documents. entitynamevalidation.useTransformation.label=Transform names automatically entitynamevalidation.useTransformation.hint=If enabled, the name strategy will be used to automatically adapt the name when possible. entitynamevalidation.useValidation.label=Validate names before saving entitynamevalidation.useValidation.hint=If enable, the name strategy will validate the name before saving: use this feature with caution since it might prevent saving some existing documents. entitynamevalidation.ReplaceCharacterEntityNameValidation.name=Character replacement entitynamevalidation.SlugEntityNameValidation.name=Preformatted names (no accents, no space, no special characters) entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.configuration=Character Replacement Strategy Configuration entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.label=Test the strategy you selected entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.hint=Allows you to check the behaviour of the name strategy you chose entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.placeholder=Type here the name of a page to test it entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.validName=Is this name valid with the selected strategy? entitynamevalidation.testStrategy.transformedName=Name after transformation by the selected strategy: entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.livetable.forbiddenCharacter=Forbidden characters entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.livetable.replacementCharacter=Replacement characters entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.livetable._actions=Actions entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.add=Add new character entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.addNewCharacter=Add new character to forbid or replace entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.label=New forbidden character entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.hint=This character will be forbidden in page names entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newForbiddenCharacter.placeholder=Type here the new forbidden character entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.label=New replacement character entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.hint=This character will replace the forbidden character in page names. If not specified, the forbidden character will be removed from page names. entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.newReplacementCharacter.placeholder=Type here the new replacement character or leave empty entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.create.inProgress=New forbidden character is being added... entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.create.done=New forbidden character has been successfully added. entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.create.failed=Error when adding the new forbidden character. entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter=Deletion of a forbidden character entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter.warning=Are you sure to delete this forbidden character? entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.removeCharacter.remove=Delete entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.remove.inProgress=The forbidden character is being deleted... entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.remove.done=The forbidden character has been deleted. entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.remove.failed=Error when deleting a forbidden character. entitynamevalidation.replacementCharacter.emptyReplacementCharacter=None
